name: Life is a Scam
description:
In 6 months your daughter is off to college. There's only one problem, you have no money to pay for her education! Oh no!

Now you must spend the next 6 months making phone calls in a dull, awful office job, where you scam strangers out of their money by selling them useless junk. Find out what kind of people you're talking to, and play to their interests to succeed!

This game was made for the Seattle Indies Game Jam over the course of 48 hours!

Code: Laura https://stormforce02.itch.io/

Art, music, sfx: Hels https://darzoz.itch.io/

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Play the free in-browser version, or pay to download the offline executable version. Both have the same content. Unzip and run to play.
